name: attributeNotEqual
title: Attribute Not Equal Selector [name!="value"]
desc: Select elements that either don't have the specified attribute, or do have the specified attribute but not with a certain value.

argument.desc: An attribute value. Can be either an unquoted single word or a quoted string.
argument.name: value

examples.desc: Finds all inputs that don't have the name 'newsletter' and appends text to the span next to it.
examples.html:
name is newsletter
no name
name is accept
